creator: Bivatec Ltd
descriptionHtml:
This app helps fish farmers to monitor their fish farm activities, productivity and profitability of their businesses. It simplifies/digitizes data entry, record keeping, accounting and reporting for aquaculture farmers. (The app works entirely offline you don't need internet to use the app).

The app is highly customizable and enables you setup your aquaculture farm i.e. types of fish you raise on your farm such as catfish, tilapia, carp, etc. feeds, fish farms and ponds, income and expense categories. After the setup, you can then go ahead and manage your fish and feeds inventory with ease.

Monitor all your farms & ponds in one place and track their activities.
Capture your stocking, feeding, sampling, mortality & harvest data. The app also allows you to attach your records to specific pond sites and pond eg cashflow tracking (income and expenses), your fish farm feeds and fish linked to specific sites or ponds on the site.

Track your farm tasks, farm notes, fish sales/harvests, fish purchase and feeds purchase expenses with the app under inventory and get real-time reports of your current inventory standing. Improve the profitability of your fish farm business with this handy app.

This fish farm management app comes with the following features;

• Enabling you to setup your farm (fish types raised, feed types, income and expense types).
• Record and track your farm cashflow (income and expenses).
• Record and track feeds inventory (feed purchases and usage/feeding).
• Record and track fish inventory (fish purchases, sales/harvests and other usages).
• Register and manage fish farms/sites and attach ponds to the pond sites/farms.
• Generation of reports for your fish farm business eg feeds report , cash flow report, fish inventory report and tasks report both in pdf and visual form.
• Be able to print the generated reports.
• Get periodic reminders about dairy data entry.
• Backup and restore of data to your Google drive account.
• Ability to export reports/records to pdf, excel, csv.
• Ability to share data between multiple devices (multi-user environment).
• A web version of the app.
• Doesn't require internet access to be used (Offline access).

Use this app and provide feedback on how we can continuously improve it to be the best fish management app.
descriptionShort: A comprehensive fish farm management tool for a modern farmer.

appDetails.developerAddress: 1st Floor, Ebenezer House, Kawempe, Kampala, Uganda
appDetails.recentChangesHtml: A comprehensive tool for fish farm management.

appDetails.developerAddress: 1st Floor, Ebenezer House, Kawempe, Kampala, Uganda

title: My Fish Manager - Farming app

container.value: 1st Floor, Ebenezer House, Kawempe, Kampala, Uganda

creator: Bivatec Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Revolutionize Your Fish Farming Operations with Our Comprehensive Fish Farm Management App

Embrace the future of aquaculture with our cutting-edge fish farm management app, precisely crafted to empower modern fish farmers with unparalleled control over their operations. Whether you're a seasoned aquaculturist or a budding enthusiast, our app seamlessly streamlines your daily tasks, enhances productivity, and paves the way for exceptional profitability.


1. Seamless Farm Management at Your Fingertips

Our intuitive app seamlessly integrates every aspect of your fish farm management, from stocking and feeding to sampling and harvesting. With a user-friendly interface and comprehensive features, you can effortlessly monitor your entire operation from a single platform.


2. Track Every Aspect of Your Fish Farm with Precision

Our app effortlessly tracks every crucial aspect of your fish farm, from fish inventory and feed consumption to cash flow and farm tasks. Capture your stocking, feeding, sampling, mortality, and harvest data with ease, ensuring that no detail goes unnoticed.


3. Unleash the Power of Data-Driven Insights

Harness the power of data-driven insights to optimize your fish farm operations. Our app generates real-time reports on your inventory, cash flow, fish growth, and more, empowering you to make informed decisions that drive profitability.


4. Optimize Feed Management for Maximum Efficiency

Efficient feed management is the cornerstone of successful fish farming. Our app helps you track your feed inventory, monitoring purchases and usage to ensure optimum utilization and minimize waste.


5. Embrace the Power of Customization

Our app is highly customizable, allowing you to tailor it to your specific fish farming needs. Configure your fish types, feed types, income and expense categories, and more, ensuring that our app perfectly aligns with your operations.


6. Seamless Offline Functionality for Uninterrupted Operations

Our app doesn't rely on constant internet connectivity, ensuring uninterrupted access to your critical data even in remote areas. With our offline functionality, you can always manage your fish farm operations with confidence.


7. Key Features:

• Comprehensive Farm Setup: Set up your farm with ease, including fish types raised, feed types, income and expense categories.
• Streamlined Cash Flow Management: Record and track your farm cash flow (income and expenses) with precision.
• Efficient Feed Inventory Management: Keep track of your feed inventory, monitoring purchases and usage for optimal utilization.
• Precise Fish Inventory Management: Record and track fish inventory (purchases, sales/harvests, and other usages) with accuracy.
• Multi-Site Farm Management: Register and manage multiple fish farms/sites and attach ponds to the corresponding sites/farms.
• Data-Driven Insights: Generate comprehensive reports for your fish farm business, including feeds reports, cash flow reports, fish inventory reports, and tasks reports, both in PDF and visual form.
• Secure Data Backup and Restore: Back up and restore your data to your Google Drive account for added security and peace of mind.
• Seamless Multi-User Collaboration: Share data and manage your fish farm operations collaboratively with multiple users.
• Versatile Data Export Options: Export reports/records to PDF, Excel, and CSV for further analysis and sharing.
• Customized Reminders and Notifications: Set up personalized reminders and notifications to stay on top of critical tasks and deadlines.
• Uninterrupted Offline Functionality: Manage your fish farm operations even without an internet connection.


8. Experience the Future of Fish Farm Management

Download our app today and experience the future of fish farm management. With our comprehensive features, intuitive interface, and unwavering commitment to innovation, we empower you to achieve operational excellence and unlock the true potential of your fish farming business.
descriptionShort: Seamless fish farm management at your fingertips.
